languages.text: "Паскаль, иногда я жалею, что в тебе нет какого протокола, чтобы вовремя остановить. Однажды твое познание встанет в цену, которую ты не сможешь заплатить".
languages.translation_comment:
In mysterious and dangerous xenos ruins.
Pasqal: "I offer up my thanks to thee, Omnissiah, for granting me the ability to serve you as a predator whose prey is Knowledge!"

traits.locale_text: "Паскаль, иногда я жалею, что в тебе нет какого протокола, чтобы вовремя остановить. Однажды твое познание встанет в цену, которую ты не сможешь заплатить".

languages.text: "Pasqal, sometimes I wish you had a protocol of some kind that I could use to make you freeze. One day, your knowledge will come at a price you won't be able to pay."
languages.translation_comment:
In mysterious and dangerous xenos ruins.
Pasqal: "I offer up my thanks to thee, Omnissiah, for granting me the ability to serve you as a predator whose prey is Knowledge!"
languages.original_text: "Паскаль, иногда я жалею, что в тебе нет какого протокола, чтобы вовремя остановить. Однажды твое познание встанет в цену, которую ты не сможешь заплатить".

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, sometimes I wish you had a protocol of some kind that I could use to make you freeze. One day, your knowledge will come at a price you won't be able to pay."
"Pasqal, sometimes I wish you had a protocol of some kind that I could use to make you freeze. One day, your knowledge will come at a price you won't be able to pay."
"Pasqal, sometimes I wish you had a protocol of some kind that I could use to make you freeze. One day, your knowledge will come at a price you won't be able to pay."
"Pasqal, sometimes I wish you had a protocol of some kind that I could use to make you freeze. One day, your knowledge will come at a price you won't be able to pay."
"Pasqal, sometimes I wish you had a protocol of some kind that I could use to make you freeze. One day, your knowledge will come at a price you won't be able to pay."
"Pasqal, sometimes I wish you had a protocol of some kind that I could use to make you freeze. One day, your knowledge will come at a price you won't be able to pay."

languages.text: 「パスカル、お前に何かしらのプロトコルでもあって、それを使えば動きを止められるのに…って時々思うよ。いつか、お前の知識が、とても払いきれない代償を呼び込む日が来るだろうな」
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, sometimes I wish you had a protocol of some kind that I could use to make you freeze. One day, your knowledge will come at a price you won't be able to pay."

traits.locale_text: 「パスカル、お前に何かしらのプロトコルでもあって、それを使えば動きを止められるのに…って時々思うよ。いつか、お前の知識が、とても払いきれない代償を呼び込む日が来るだろうな」

languages.text: "Pasqal, manchmal wünschte ich, Ihr hättet ein Protokoll, mit dem ich Euch einfrieren könnte. Eines Tages wird Euer Wissen einen Preis haben, den Ihr nicht bezahlen könnt."
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, sometimes I wish you had a protocol of some kind that I could use to make you freeze. One day, your knowledge will come at a price you won't be able to pay."

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, manchmal wünschte ich, Ihr hättet ein Protokoll, mit dem ich Euch einfrieren könnte. Eines Tages wird Euer Wissen einen Preis haben, den Ihr nicht bezahlen könnt."

languages.text: « Vous savez, Pasqal... Parfois, j'aimerais que vous ayez un protocole qui me permettrait de vous figer. Un jour, votre connaissance vous coûtera trop cher. »
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, sometimes I wish you had a protocol of some kind that I could use to make you freeze. One day, your knowledge will come at a price you won't be able to pay."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez, Pasqal... Parfois, j'aimerais que vous ayez un protocole qui me permettrait de vous figer. Un jour, votre connaissance vous coûtera trop cher. »

languages.text: «Pasqal, a veces desearía que tuviese algún tipo de protocolo que pudiera usar para paralizarlo. Algún día sus conocimientos le pasarán factura, y será un precio que no podrá pagar».
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, sometimes I wish you had a protocol of some kind that I could use to make you freeze. One day, your knowledge will come at a price you won't be able to pay."

traits.locale_text: «Pasqal, a veces desearía que tuviese algún tipo de protocolo que pudiera usar para paralizarlo. Algún día sus conocimientos le pasarán factura, y será un precio que no podrá pagar».

languages.text: “帕斯卡，有时候我真希望我手上能有某种协议，可以让你立刻住手。因为总有一天，你渴求的知识会让你付出无法承受的代价。”
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, sometimes I wish you had a protocol of some kind that I could use to make you freeze. One day, your knowledge will come at a price you won't be able to pay."

traits.locale_text: “帕斯卡，有时候我真希望我手上能有某种协议，可以让你立刻住手。因为总有一天，你渴求的知识会让你付出无法承受的代价。”

languages.text: "Bazen keşke seni dondurmak için bir protokol olsaydı diyorum Pasqal. Bir gün tüm bildiklerinin bedeli, ödenemeyecek bir raddeye ulaşacak."
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, sometimes I wish you had a protocol of some kind that I could use to make you freeze. One day, your knowledge will come at a price you won't be able to pay."

traits.locale_text: "Bazen keşke seni dondurmak için bir protokol olsaydı diyorum Pasqal. Bir gün tüm bildiklerinin bedeli, ödenemeyecek bir raddeye ulaşacak."

languages.original_text: "Pasqal, sometimes I wish you had a protocol of some kind that I could use to make you freeze. One day, your knowledge will come at a price you won't be able to pay."
